Name: Experience Jewelry Workshop In Nha Trang City
Description:
Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a jewelry workshop, learn the subtleties of jewelry work, unveil your individuality.
As you immerse yourself in the creative process, you'll witness your vision come to life, culminating in the creation of a unique jewelry masterpiece. This personalized creation holds sentimental value, making it a meaningful gift for a loved one or a cherished keepsake for yourself. Whether you aspire to unveil the artisan within or deepen your appreciation for the craft, our Jewelry Masterclass promises an unforgettable experience that transcends the boundaries of conventional learning. Unleash your creativity and craft a tangible expression of beauty that will be treasured for a lifetime.
What's Included:
In the end, you will craft the basic jewelry - a ring with gemstones.
During the workshop you can switch to another masterpiece for the additional payment.
Tools ,Gemstones ,Pearls ,Sterling silver

Stop 1: DO THEATRE
Duration: Admission ticket included
Description: Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of "Life Puppets" with a ticket to the mesmerizing show at Đó Theatre. This unique performance seamlessly blends various forms of puppetry, including water, string, shadow, and animated, with contemporary dance, creating an unforgettable spectacle that transcends cultural boundaries.

At Đó Theatre, you'll witness a dynamic co-performing stage where puppets come to life in a stunning display of artistry and storytelling. From traditional Vietnamese water puppetry to intricate string manipulation and the evocative shadows cast by delicate figures, each act unfolds with precision and grace.

Step into the theater and prepare to be transported on a journey that communicates multiple cultural values in a language understood by all. Through the universal language of puppetry and dance, "Life Puppets" captivates audiences of all ages, offering a truly immersive experience that lingers long after the final curtain falls.
Admission: Admission ticket included

Name: Nha Trang Instagram Day Tour
Description: This tour is a journey through Nha Trang’s most iconic cultural and scenic landmarks. Begin at Tram Huong Tower and explore a beautiful Catholic church before immersing yourself in the ancient Cham heritage at Ponagar Temple. This tour combines history, culture, and natural beauty, offering a well-rounded experience of Nha Trang's unique charm.

Name: Vietnam: Life Puppets Show for Đó Theatre Ticket
Description:
Đó Theatre, a stunning architectural masterpiece inspired by the traditional Vietnamese fishing tool cái Đó, is located on Bai Tien Beach, offering a unique and immersive setting for performances.
The Life Puppets show is a captivating blend of water, string, shadow, and animated puppetry combined with contemporary dance. Accompanied by the mesmerizing sounds of the Southeast Asian Soul orchestra, the performance brings to life the 12 zodiac characters, each with their own emotional and dramatic story.
Themes of survival, rivalry, and life’s challenges are explored, making Life Puppet a beautiful reflection of culture, nature, and human experiences.
What's Included: The ticket price is applied for 01 person and valid for 01 time use at the specific time mentioned.

Name: Nha Trang Half-Day Sightseeing Tour by Car
Description:
Start your journey at Hon Chong Promontory, a stunning natural formation of boulders with a mysterious five-finger handprint overlooking the sea. Continue to the Po Nagar Cham Towers, an ancient temple complex dating back to 781 A.D. that showcases Cham architecture and history.
Visit Long Son Pagoda, known for its towering white Buddha statue, and then explore the historic Nha Trang Cathedral, famed for its enduring stone architecture. Conclude your tour at Dam Market, a bustling spot where you can experience local customs and shop for unique finds, before returning to your hotel or the harbor.

Name: Camping, Hiking, Coral Reefs Snorkeling From Nha Trang
Description:
Escape the hustle and bustle of city life and relax on a camping trip to Bich Dam Island. Enjoy a seafood BBQ feast, go fishing, hiking, admire the sunrise at the lighthouse , and more.
3:00PM: Pick-up at hotel.
4:15PM: Arrive at Bich Dam Island and be mesmerized by the crystal-clear waters, the long stretch of white sand, and the unspoiled scenery. Swim and snorkel, the underwater world unveils itself before your eyes, with colorful coral reefs and schools of fish darting about.
5:30PM Take a shower and relax
6:00PM Recharge with a BBQ right on the island. Enjoy fresh air and peaceful atmosphere of watching the night sea
8:00PM Go Fishing and free to relax. Tour guide will prepare fishing rod for you.
4:00AM Hike up to a high point to watch the sunrise. Have a light breakfast and sip a delicious cup of coffee at the lighthouse.
6:30AM Back to Campsite. Swim, snorkel or simply lie on the sand enjoying the sunshine.
7:45AM Finally, the canoe will take you back to the mainland
What's Included:
fishing rod

Description:
What may lie above the ocean surface may already be of a mesmerizing quality, it is what lies below the azure-blue sea that may take your breath away. An introduction to the world of diving and one will be hooked for life to watch the world down below.
• A diving must for avid scuba divers of any level;
• See countless fish and soft coral species around
• Guided by true professional scuba diving instructors
• See the beauty of underwater Nha Trang Bay

Customers who book this tour on private basis will receive private transfers from and to the starting point but the customers will join the local boat with other customers. Return transfers for this excursion apply only / are inclusive for customers staying in Nha Trang. Transfers outside these areas, including any harbour and the Nha Trang / Cam Ramh International Airport are excluded. Supplements apply for customers who want to join this excursion outside one of these regions.
Customers are advised that during the TET celebrations (celebration of Vietnamese New Year), excursions and tours may be subject to supplementary charges and/or may see longer waiting times than normal.
We will do all possible to comply with any dietary requirements during this excursion; it may not always be possible to confirm your wishes in advance based on the choice of local restaurant. We regret to inform you that this excursion is not suitable for wheelchair users. • We always will make efforts to confirm the exact pick-up time upon reservation. For any operational issues in which are not able to confirm the exact pick-up time in advance, we reserve the right to inform you the day before the departure of the tour.
Due to the absence of ATM machines and credit cards payment portals, particularly on islands and inside nature reserves, we highly recommend to bring sufficient cash with you.
Please note pick-up and drop-off services may not be confirmed for customers staying at private residences, apartment complexes, or other non-registered tourism accommodations. Customers may be asked to meet at a nearby hotel for pick-up and drop off.
Natural elements of any kind have a destructive effect on electronic equipment. It is the customer’s own responsibility to ensure that any camera, mobile telephone or other device is properly wrapped and protected against these elements. We cannot be held responsible in any way for negligence and/or not following suggestions for any damage related to this.
Please ensure that you bring sunglasses, a hat /cap and sunblock with a high SPF factor when traveling with us on this tour – even when it is cloudy, the sunrays still have an immense power. • We reserve the right to make necessary changes to the excursion in case of unfavourable weather conditions or situations where we are forced to make alterations to guarantee the safety of our guests (especially between November and April).
All our scuba diving instructors are either PADI and/or SSI certified. These are the two leading scuba diving organizations in the world.
It is essential for the safety of any scuba diver not to fly within 12 hours (one day) or 18 hours (multiple days) due to the high concentration of nitrogen in the blood stream. These regulations do not apply for customers who are only snorkelling.
The protection of the country’s flora and fauna is of immense importance for us. We will not pursue any activities for guests that are not in line with our animal, wildlife and environment protection principles.
It is the responsibility of the customer to provide us with the correct hotel information, should pick-up and drop-off services be included in the package. Any changes in accommodation outside 24 hours will be handled accordingly: changes within 24 hours may be on request.
In the event of no-show or change of accommodation without prior consent and confirmation from us within 24 hours may result in the applicable cancellation charges as outlined in the terms and conditions.
Not wheelchair accessible

Name: Ba Ho Waterfall and Countryside Guided Motorcycle Tour
Description:
Leaving Nha Trang beach city, tour guides will drive you on calm and cool roads along beautiful peaceful countryside villages of Nha Trang . We visit a bread manufactory of a local family. Then, you will experience driving on a wooden bridge across poetic Cai river. We can stop and enjoy the romantic and poetic view of  Cai river.
After that, we continue our trip on stunning countryside roads with rice paddies and lush green coconut plantations. Continue our trip, we visit craft families making mats, rice noodles, sesame rice cakes. We also take a walk around to explore a countryside market, Thanh market, 30km north of Nha Trang city, where you can see real rural life so that you learn more about life of friendly local people. Tour guide we will buy food to prepare for lunch at the waterfall.

Name: Full Day Nha Trang City and Cai River Tour
Description:
Nha Trang is a place of rich culture, such as the Ponagar Tower, built by the Cham people between the 7th and 12th Centuries, as well as the Cathedral built by the French in the early 1920s and the very natural Chong Promontory.
Visit all the historical sights in the area, including Nha Trang Cathedral, Long Son pagoda, Chong Promontory, Ponagar Towers and Dam Market
Travel down the Cai river to observe the peaceful life of the villages along Nha Trang's waterway and witness the daily life of the local people.
Drink coconut milk on coconut island and observe a wide range of local handicrafts in production.
Enjoy the beautiful scenery that unfolds along the banks, experience and make acquaintance with local people in their natural scenery

Name: Full Day Car Tour Excursion Mui Ne ( Minimum 4 guest)
Description: Mui Ne is famous for its enormous red and white sand dunes. The 'red dunes' are conveniently located north of the main strip, but the 'white dunes' 24km northeast, are the more impressive – the near-constant oceanic winds sculpt the pale yellow sands into wonderful Saharaesque formations. But as this is Vietnam (not deepest Mali) there's little chance of experiencing the silence of the desert.

Description: See more than just the beach of Nha Trang as we visit some of the sights of this seaside town. Learn about local customs and legends while taking in religious structures as well as Vietnamese people in their daily activities at the market and fishing village. Through this cultural Nha Trang city tour you will experience the reality of Vietnam.

Departure Point: Novotel Nha Trang, Trần Phú 50, Nha Trang, 652076
Itinerary:
Total Duration: Duration: 6 hours

Stop 1: National Oceanographic Museum of Vietnam
Duration: Admission ticket included
Description: Established in 1923, it was one of the first centers for scientific research in Vietnam and is an important location for tropical oceanographic research. You can see some of the local marine life, along with a comprehensive collection of specimens of marine life.
Admission: Admission ticket included

Stop 2: Long Son Pagoda
Duration: Admission ticket included
Description: the most impressive construction in Nha Trang is Long Son Pagoda founded in 19th century. After several renovations, the biggest one in 1963 when the huge white Buddha was built in the memory of The monks and nuns who burnt themselves to protest against religious persecution. On the high flat ground you will have a general view of the city far below. You can see the web-like a maze of streets and roads and houses and the river gently winding along.
Admission: Admission ticket included

Stop 3: Po Nagar Cham Towers
Duration: Admission ticket included
Description: These cham towers were built during 7th century to honor the goddess Ponagar considered to be the mother of mothers, the goddess of the country, who came to be identified with the Hindu goddesses Bhagavati and Mahishasuramardini. From the towers you see the panoramic views of the river meeting the blue Sea.
Admission: Admission ticket included

Stop 4: Nha Tho Nui
Duration: Admission ticket included

Name: Ba Ho Waterfall Tour from Nha Trang
Description:
On this tour, you’ll go on a jungle trek and visit the popular Ba Ho waterfalls in Nha Trang. You’ll begin the tour in the morning and be transferred to the start point of the trek. Then you’ll go jungle trekking for about half an hour and arrive at the Ba Ho waterfalls.
On arrival at the waterfalls, you’ll have time to take in the natural surroundings and go for a swim under the falls. After the swim, you’ll head to a local restaurant where you’ll get to eat authentic Vietnamese food for lunch. You’ll then be dropped off back at your hotel in Nha Trang city centre.
What's Included:
Lunch
Transportation in an air-conditioned vehicle
Hotel pickup and drop-off in selected areas
Additional Info:

Name: Private Half Day Nha Trang Countryside Biking Tour
Description:
Here's your chance to explore Nha Trang in an up close and a personal way. Your cycling expedition begins with a quick briefing on the traffic in Vietnam, general rules of the road, safe riding procedures and turning signals.
08:30: You will be picked up from the hotel by our expert tour guide and provided bikes.
Our trip is biking around the city and stop at 4 places: Mat Weaving House, Wooden Bridge, Local Market and Ancient House.
It might takes 15 minutes for each stop.
* Mat Weaving - Meet the locals, let them teach you how to weave a mat by yourself and learn about the history and culture of this area.
* Wooden Bridge : Take a short walk on the bridge and take some pictures of stunning views of the countryside.
* Local Market - Walk through a local market to know more the daily life of Vietnamese.
* Ancient Wooden House – Traditional Vietnamese house made by wood and remained for 200 years, you will be truly immersed yourself in a distinct cultural identity.
What's Included:
Private transportation
Bottled water
All Fees and Taxes

Learn about the diverse marine life and the delicate ecosystem you're exploring. We provide all the snorkeling gear you need, including masks, fins, and snorkels, ensuring a comfortable and hassle-free underwater adventure. Refuel after your snorkeling escapades with a Vietnamese lunch, savoring the fresh flavors. More than just a snorkeling trip, this is an unforgettable adventure into the heart of Nha Trang Bay's underwater paradise.

Nha Trang City is known not only for its romantic beauty of blue sea and white sand but also for many beautiful landscapes, historical sites, waterfalls and plentiful of good foods. Welcome to this trip we will bring all that special things to you, this tour will take you amazing Nature at Baho Waterfalls ..., waterfalls activities like sightseeing,swimming, Trekking and jumping at waterfall
Highlights of Trip:
❤️ Swimming, Jumping and Trekking at Ba Ho waterfall
We will pick you up from your hotel in Nha Trang center and heading to BaHo waterfall, on the way we enjoy so beautiful landscapes around 30 minutes will reach BaHo which main place we will visit. So we will start to trek up around 1km to reach 1st Lake, you have fee time to swim, Jumping and relaxing. You also can keep hiking up to the 2nd & 3rd Lake to explore all special of waterfall. Don't forget to bring camera to take great photos.

Name: Half Day Private River Cruise Tour Nha Trang
Description:
Nha Trang is known as the most beautiful beach city in Vietnam. And besides, one of the best ways to pleasantly explore Nha Trang is cruising along the Cai River - the longest and exquisite river in Nha Trang.
08:00: You will be picked up from Hotel by our expert tour guide and transferred by car to the pier.
Get onboard and put on the life jacket by your side.
Visit many interesting sites of Nha Trang:
* Whale Shrine - The place that all of fishermen must come to pray for blessedness before putting out to sea.
* Coconut Dune - Meet the local people and have a coconut that is freshly picked from the tree.
* Wooden Bridge – Take a short walk on the bridge for sightseeing and take some pictures of the daily life in the countryside.
* Ancient Wooden House - Real Vietnamese house made by wood and remained for 200 years.
* Mat Weaving - Meet the local and let them teach you how to weave a best fine mat by yourself.
What's Included:
Private transportation
Bottled water
All Fees and Taxes

Name: Two day Explore Dalat from Nha Trang ( Elephant & Pongour Falls.)
Description:
Dalat or Da Lat is the capital city of Lam Dong province, Vietnam. Da Lat is the City of Flowers and honeymooners with lovely French villas, the fresh air, the beautiful waterfalls and gorgeous lakes sits in a lush and green valley of postcard beauty.
Da Lat sits approx. 1500 m (4921 ft) above sea level on the Lang Biang Plateau in the southern parts of the Central Highlands. So, you do not be surprised when someone called Da Lat as The City in the Forest.
So one day trip from Nhatrang to Dalat will a great day for your vacation!
Day 1 - Explore Dalat City and Datanla Waterfall.
- RoBin Hill –Cable car.
- Truc Lam Zen Monastery
- Paradise lake
- Datanla waterfall
- Linh Phuoc Pagoda
- Dalat old railway Station
Stay Overnight in Dalat
*Day 2
-Van Thanh Flower Village.
-Ta Nung Pass: great landscape
-Coffee Plantation: A Thousand hectares of coffee trees.
-Weasel Coffee
-Cricket Farmm
-Rice Wine making
-Traditional Silk Factory
-Elephant Waterfall
-Linh An Pagoda
-Pongour waterfalls

Name: Private Nha Trang City Tour from Cruise Port
Description: Going to the beautiful and vibrant coastal city of Nha Trang, besides islands and beaches with crystal clear water and fine sand under a blue sky, tourists also have an opportunity to explore many historical sites and cultural works with unique architectural styles. Make the most of your time at shore and discover the city of Nha Trang on this excursion from the cruise port. With a private guide, explore the resort city and visit the main highlights including Long Son Pagoda, Ponagar Cham Towers, Chong Rock, and Dam Market. You also have the opportunity to bargain and shop for souvenirs at local markets with help from your guide.

Name: Private Tour Nha Trang City Full Day
Description:
Experience our Private Full Day Excursion tailored exclusively for you!
Embark on a serene journey through the picturesque landscapes of Vietnam as you make your way to the heart of the city. Upon your arrival, meet your seasoned tour guide, ready to lead you on an enchanting tour of Nha Trang City.
Discover the awe-inspiring allure of the Hon Chong, marvel at the grandeur of Po Nagar Cham Towers, and capture iconic moments at landmarks like the Long Son Pagoda, National Oceanographic Museum of Vietnam, Nha Tho Nui, and many more.
Our excursions are meticulously designed schedule.
We'll greet you directly at the hotel and ensure you return with ample time to relax and relish your day.

Name: Half Day Private Countryside Tour Nha Trang
Description:
It takes 15km to the South is a part of Vietnam culture by a countryside to visit some local house and learn more the handicraft still working. From Conical Hat (the symbol of Vietnam women) to making Noodles (as famous by local name Pho), see and try how to make rice papers or try to weaving a Mat. Connect to local people to know more Vietnam culture and how people friendly with the travellers. Let our tour guide take you to discover....
* Mat Weaving - Wooden Bridge - Ancient Wooden House – Conical Hat.
* Making Noodles - Known as a famous Vietnamese traditional food Pho noodles
* Rice papers - You may get a chance to make a rice paper and learn more about the recipe to cook the local food with rice papers.

This excursion takes you to visit a selection of the numerous attractions in Nha Trang City. First the car will drive you to Nha Trang and drive to Cau Da port for a visit to the Oceanographic Museum. After that, you will go to Long Son Pagoda, Chong Promontory and the Po Nagar Cham Towers. End of morning, visit local Dam Market. After having lunch at restaurant, relax and enjoy exclusive Herbal Massage experience at one of the most top ranked name spa in Nha Trang (Su Spa or Daisy Spa as recommend - your own expense). Transfer back to your hotel with lots of chance to observe local life.
Highlights:
• Comprehensive tour of Nha Trang for first-time visitors

Name: Flexible Nha Trang Half Day Tour to Serene Garden
Description:
Serene Garden is a quiet, less touristy place that is a chance to immerse yourself in the healing beauty of nature while giving your body really good physical exercises. The best way to enjoy an escape from nature is to walk slowly, admire the scenery, and chill in the cool water. A number of natural spots are available if you want to take photos. If we are lazy, we can ride an electric shuttle bus slowly to view this charming landscape. On the way back, stop at the nice beach for a cup of coffee or swimming (optional). Foot massage, 30 minutes (tickets excluded; optional).
This is a private trip, so it will be flexible to match your interests and choices.

Name: Private Tour Nha Trang To Bau Truc Pottery Village And The PoKlong Garai Towers
Description:
07:00: You will be pick up from hotel by our expert tour guide and private car. Drive along the beach street on the way to Cam Ranh airport.
Po Klong Garai Temple - According to legend, Po Klong Garai (Cham language : Dragon king of J'rai people) started life as a lowly cowherd, but became king of Champa by destiny, ruling wisely and for the good of the people.
Stop at Bau Truc Pottery Village - Its remain over 200 years old. It means that the pottery village was originated from a long time ago. Bau Truc ceramic products which are kneaded by hand are standalone items demonstrating the talent and unique craftwork of the artisans in the village.
Have lunch at local restaurant.
Visit: Vineyard and Apple farm
14:45: Return to Nha Trang.
End of trip

Description:
A unique sea trip on a luxury sailing yacht in Nha Trang Bay! Amazing program, food and drinks are included!
An exciting and fun-packed yacht cruise with champagne, delicious lunch, unlimited drinks, fruit and snacks. The wide range of activities are offered such as swimming, sea fishing, snorkelling and diving water activities. Sailing to the southern islands in Nha Trang Bay and cruising along the nature reserves of Hon Mieu, Hon Tam and Hon Mot islands with an excursion to a traditional Vietnamese floating fishing village. The Day Cruise is an ideal sailing option for 1-10 people and bigger groups of people, such as corporate clients, business partners or families and friends visiting Nha Trang. Cruise photo and live music options are available.

The real cultural trip. An excellent insight into the history and culture of the city and also that of the Vietnam.

Itinerary:
Total Duration: Duration: 4 hours - 5 hours

Stop 1: Po Nagar Cham Towers
Duration: Admission ticket included
Description: Depart at 9 am Return at 2:00 pm. The real cultural trip. An excellent insight into the history and culture of the city and also that of the Vietnam.

Join this excursion to visit a selection of the numerous cultural attractions situated in Nha Trang. You will be taken from the south to the north of Nha Trang to visit the following attractive places: 

1. Ponagar Cham Tower – The Champa Kingdom flourished for over a thousand years. This tower complex overlooking the Cai River is perhaps the best preserved of all Cham sites. Dedicated to the goddess Uroja, the central tower features a black stone sculpture of the deity. Local villagers still bring offerings of flowers and incense to her shrine. An outstanding example of Cham architecture, panoramic views of the surrounding bay and countryside.
Admission: Admission ticket included

Stop 2: Hon Chong
Duration: Admission ticket included
Description: 2. Hon Chong Promontory – This small, rocky peninsula juts out into the South China Sea and offers fine views of the bay, the coast and the offshore islands.
Admission: Admission ticket included

Stop 3: Long Son Pagoda
Duration: Free admission
Description: 3. Long Son Pagoda – Dragon-shaped balustrades flank the entrance to the pagoda. The sanctuary is decorated with murals and images of the Buddha. The sanctuary is decorated with murals and images of the Buddha. Behind the pagoda sits an enormous white Buddha built in 1965. The Buddha commemorates those monks who protested the abuses of the Diem regime by setting themselves aflame.
Admission: Free admission

Stop 4: Dam Market
Duration: Free admission
Description: 4. Dam Market: Let your personal guide show you some of the most selective silk and handicraft shops, along with the popular Dam market. You will not only have the chance to shop till you drop, but to meet with the best local tailors and sample the traditional Vietnamese culinary delights. 

5. Coffee shop: You can sip Vietnamese pure coffee or other tasty treats in the city after lunch

Including: guide, beef noodles soup Pho for lunch, entrance fee, car 

Clothing: respectfully dressed, covered shoulders and chest, long pants or skirts

Should bring: hat or cap, sunglasses, sun cream
Admission: Free admission

Name: Nha Trang Half Day Tour to Po Nagar and Long Son Pagoda
Description: Experience the captivating charm of Nha Trang City on our half-day tour. Nha Trang boasts a rich tapestry of cultural and natural wonders. Join us to embark on a journey that takes you to the iconic Po Nagar Tower, a testament to the Cham civilization's legacy. Explore the intricate architecture and discover ancient relics that date back to before 781 A.D. Capture breathtaking views of the Cai River and the picturesque riverside village. Our tour also includes a visit to the Stone Church, an architectural gem reminiscent of Western Catholic churches. Immerse yourself in its beauty and history. We'll then proceed to the Long Son Pagoda, a vibrant Buddhist temple bustling with activity. Climb 150 steps to reach the top and witness a mesmerizing panoramic view. Throughout the tour, our knowledgeable local guide will provide insights into the city's history and culture. Join us for a half-day adventure that unveils the heart of Nha Trang.

Name: Combo Speedboat Hon Tam Mud Bath With Buffet Lunch
Description:
As soon as you step off the speedboat and arrive on the island, you must visit Hon Tam's famous wedding bridge. It's known as the Wedding Bridge since it's a favorite wedding photo site for newlyweds. The bridge has beautiful cable-stayed spans, rustic colors, and, most significantly, an extraordinarily sparkling sea background, making it a great place for creating stunning photographs.

Name: NHA TRANG WATERFALL TOUR (Trekking, Climbing, Swimming) Off the beaten tracks
Description:
The waterfall is around 35 km from the city. We then head into the mountains, passing rice fields and plantations. Into the jungle and following the river on local paths, then scrabbling up over the rocks to the waterfalls, where you can choose from a number of Jump site from first time beginner to the more experienced. The water vapour and humid exhalation from the wet rocks will make you shiver in amused complacency. The scenery is bathed in a more serene quiet and one seems to be lost into a fairy land. To reach the first pool we climb a short distance over some rocks before swimming in the cool waters.
The brave can jump down into the deep pool below. You will also leave feelings relaxed and refreshed by the sound and glory of nature

Name: Dien Cape and Hon Nua Island - 1-day Tour
Description:
Tourism in Phu Yen has been awaken recently and rapidly increased due to its numerous tremendous natural and historical sights. However, there is an island located in the North of Vung Ro Bay had been almost forgotten. It is Hon Nua Island – an island with the height of 105 meters from the sea level and lie isolated on the sea border between Khanh Hoa and Phu Yen, an immaculate and majestic island.
If you go on Ca pass (Deo Ca), you should stop for a while to observe the miracle. You will see one side is precipitous cliffs, one side is turquoise Vung Ro Bay embraced the pass. If you continue to look more carefully, you will realize a small island like a pea in the North of Vung Ro. That is Hon Nua Island, one of the unusual unadulterated natural scenery that is still remained even it is several kilometers apart from the shore.
What's Included:
Air conditioned bus/ van/ car, Round trip speedboat
A hat from Nhatrangtourist
A bottle of water (500ml/bottle/pax)

Name: NHA TRANG WATERFALL TOUR - Trekking, Climbing, Swimming
Description:
The waterfall is around 30km from the city. We then head into the mountains, passing rice fields and plantations. Into the jungle and following the river on local paths, then scrabbling up over the rocks to the waterfalls, where you can choose from a number of Jump site from first time beginner to the more experienced. The water vapour and humid exhalation from the wet rocks will make you shiver in amused complacency. The scenery is bathed in a more serene quiet and one seems to be lost into a fairy land. To reach the first pool we climb a short distance over some rocks before swimming in the cool waters.
The brave can jump down into the deep pool below. You will also leave feelings relaxed and refreshed by the sound and glory of nature

Local guide
Round-trip private transfer

Nha Trang City is known not only for its romantic beauty of blue sea and white sand but also for many beautiful landscapes, historical sites, waterfalls and plentiful of good foods. Welcome to this trip we will bring all that special things to you, this tour will take you on beautiful countryside, Traditional jobs wil be passed Rice field , Pagoda, Woode Bridge, Rice Paper Making, Mat Making..., waterfalls activities like sightseeing,swimming, Trekking and jumping at waterfall
Highlights of Trip:
❤️ Swimming, Jumping and Trekking at Ba Ho waterfall
We will pick you up from your hotel in Nha Trang center and heading to BaHo waterfall, on the way we enjoy so beautiful landscapes around 30 minutes will reach BaHo which main place we will visit. So we will start to trek up around 1km to reach 1st Lake, you have fee time to swim, Jumping and relaxing. You also can keep hiking up to the 2nd & 3rd Lake to explore all special of waterfall. Don't forget to bring camera to take great photos.

Name: Half Day Nha Trang Car Tour in Vietnam
Description:
Half-Day Nha Trang City Highlights Tour
Start your journey at Hon Chong Promontory, a stunning natural formation of boulders with a mysterious five-finger handprint overlooking the sea. Continue to the Po Nagar Cham Towers, an ancient temple complex dating back to 781 A.D. that showcases Cham architecture and history.
Visit Long Son Pagoda, known for its towering white Buddha statue, and then explore the historic Nha Trang Cathedral, famed for its enduring stone architecture. Conclude your tour at Dam Market, a bustling spot where you can experience local customs and shop for unique finds, before returning to your hotel or the harbor.

Name: One day Private VIP Trip Explore Dalat from Nha Trang
Description:
TOUR INTRODUCTION:
Da Lat or Dalat (Nicknames: City of Thousand Flowers, City of Thousand Pines, City of Eternal Spring, City in the Fog, Little Paris) is the capital of Lâm Đồng Province and the largest city of the Central Highlands region in Vietnam. The city is located 1,500 m (4,900 ft) above sea level on the Langbian Plateau. Da Lat is one of the most popular tourist destinations in Vietnam.
Da Lat's specific sights are pine woods and twisting roads full of marigold (Vietnamese: hoa dã quỳ) and mimosa blossom in the winter. The city's temperate weather stands in contrast to Vietnam's otherwise tropical climate. Mist covering the valleys almost year-round leads to its name City of Eternal Spring.
Residents and tourists have said that Da Lat has all four seasons in one day: spring in the morning, summer at noon, autumn in the afternoon and winter at night, from the sunset to the sunrise.
So lets Join with us this trip to experience and explore Best city in Vietnam.

Name: Half-day Nha Trang City Tour
Description:
A half day tour that gives you insight into some of Nha Trang’s most important architectural, cultural and historical sites.
Immerse yourself in the vibrant rhythm of local life at Nha Trang's oldest market, offering a glimpse into authentic daily experiences. Then, ascend to Long Son Pagoda to marvel at a colossal Buddha statue and enjoy panoramic vistas of the city and its surroundings, capturing the essence of its beauty from the best vantage point. Delve into the rich history of the Cham civilization as you explore the Cham Ponagar Temple Complex, gaining fascinating insights into their ancient Hindu-worshipping practices, completing your cultural journey with a deeper understanding of Vietnam's heritage.

Name: Half Day Private Cultural Tour Nha Trang
Description:
If you want to discover all sites of Nha Trang in a day. The best way to takes 6 hours and combine both itinerary Countryside and City Tour.

Head to Countryside to visit handicraft and meet the local people.
* Mat Weaving - Meet the locals, let them teach you how to weave a mat by yourself.
* Wooden Bridge : Take a short walk on the bridge and take some pictures of stunning views of the countryside.
* Ancient Wooden House – Traditional Vietnamese house made by wood
* Rice papers - You may get a chance to make a rice paper and learn more about the recipe to cook the local food with rice papers.
* Long Son Pagoda - Was built 1886 by Monk Thich Ngo Tri and became the biggest Pagoda in Nha Trang
* Ponagar Temple (Cham Tower) - Was built rough 778 by Cham Dynasty
* Chong Promontory (Chong Rock) - Natural landscape with the legendary story of the wife and husband

Name: Full Day Private Tour To Da Lat From Nha Trang
Description:
Da Lat's specific sights are pine wood (forming the name: City of thousands of pine trees) with twisting roads and tree marigold (Vietnamese: dã quỳ) blossom in the winter. The city’s temperate weather stands in contrast to Vietnam's otherwise tropical climate. Mist covering the valleys almost year-round leads to its name City of Eternal Spring.
* Stop at Khanh Vinh have a morning coffee and take some photos beside river and meet some ethnic children.
* Stop at Coffee Plantation and know more information.
11:30: Arrived Da Lat city (a city located 1, 500m above sea level).
* Visit Linh Phuoc Pagoda.
* Visit Bao Dai Summer King Villa.
* Visit Crazy House before having lunch and hot tea.
* Truc Lam Zen Monastery by cable car on 2,200m and takes 15 minutes.
* Datanla waterfall by roller coaster.
* Lam Vien Square.
* Da Lat Market

Description:
Private trip From NhaTrang To Mui Ne
About 220km from NhaTrang city, Mui Ne dotted with breathtaking beaches and vast sand dunes with changing shapes depending on wind directions. Mui Ne is the best place for those looking for a couple of days of seaside relaxation.
Obviously, lots of beautiful spots in Mui Ne attract domestic as well as international tourists such as huge White and Red Sandunes, Fairy Springs, capital of Dragon Fruit Farm, PoShaNu Cham Tower… The most must-see one is the Sand Dune...
Transfer from Nha Trang to Mui Ne by private car is the best choice for travelers. With distance 220km, it will takes 6 - 8 hours transfer by private car combine with sightseeing and relaxing on the way. Private trip is not only convenient way to explore landscape belong the way but also it is the best choice to go directly from NhaTrang by a Private trip & Sandunes. others transport, you will not have time to stop on the way for sightseeing like with private car. Name: 2 Days Private Trip Explore Nha Trang - Da Lat - Mui Ne (Vice versa)
Description:
Travelling with this classic Nha Trang Da Lat Mui Ne Tour, you will get great memories about three beautiful destinations in Sourthern Viet Nam including Nha Trang - Da Lat & Mui Ne. We will depart from Nha Trang up to Dalat with higher level (1500meter above sea level) and down to Mui Ne by beautiful Passes.
- NhaTrang is one of the most important tourist hubs of Vietnam, thanks to its beaches with fine and clean sand and the clear ocean water with mild temperatures all year round. The possibly most beautiful street of Nha Trang is Tran Phu Street along the seaside, sometimes referred to as the Pacific Coast Highway of Vietnam.
- Dalat flower city is nice place where is famous for cool weather all round year and romantic scenery… or explore secret waterfalls like Elephant, Datanla, Pongour waterfalls will be highlights of your trip
- Besides, you have chance to explore Mui Ne with beautiful beach, take nice sunset view of Red Sand Dunes or visit fishing village and white Sand Dunes…

We are a Vietnam tour company specializing in tailor-made multi-destination tours of Vietnam. Every tour, transfer and activity we provide is customized according to your personal needs.
Book a transfer with us, you will always have the guarantee to get the best prices and an excellent service. All our vehicles are carefully selected and in possession of all the licenses required by law. Our professional drivers will guarantee you maximum comfort for your transfer around Vietnam.
Why do you need a car rental instead of tours?
- The first advantage of car rental is lower cost. It is sometimes better to have a tour guide, you can go to tourist attractions in Vietnam by yourself to maximize your budget.
- On group tours, tourists must follow tour guides and can not customize itineraries. On private transfers, you can easily make the trip personal by planning the journey at your wish.

Description:
Being one of 29 most beautiful bays in the world, Nha Trang is a popular destination among beach lovers. Joining our Nha Trang day tours, tourists are ensured to get a full look at beauty of the most outstanding landscapes, enjoy the fresh seafood dishes and observe the peaceful but dynamic life of the locals.
Nha Trang is with no doubt one of the most favorite tourist destinations in Vietnam. This beach city has been very famous for its fantastic natural scenery of mountains, beaches and islands combined. Moreover, it is home to many historical sites such as: Long Son Pagoda and Thap Ba Ponaga Tower and temples.
Don't miss this Nha Trang city tour to explore this beautiful land and get wonderful memories !

Name: NhaTrang-Dalat-Nhatrang by car minimum 02 people
Description:
Đà Lạt, the capital of Lâm Đồng Province in southern Vietnam’s Central Highlands, is centered around a lake and surrounded by hills, pine forests, lakes and waterfalls. Known as the “City of Eternal Spring” for its distinctive temperate climate, Đà Lạt was developed as a resort by the French in the early 1900s, and many reminders of its colonial heritage remain.
With this excursion you will be able to explore all the highlight and landscape of Dalat such as : Linh Phuoc pagooda , Elephant waterfall , Crazy House , Weasel Coffee farm , Silk factory , and enjoying most beautiful scenery along the way .

Name: Island Hopping Tour and Floating Party Nha Trang
Description: Experience a floating party and go island hopping on a trip in Nha Trang. Snorkel in the sea and admire the coral reef, eat seafood in the floating restaurant, sunbathe on Tranh Beach, and more. See the picturesque sea and feel the breeze with a sailing trip from Nha Trange. Swim in the warm blue sea then go snorkeling to explore the vibrant coral reef. Listen to music, drink wine, and have fun with a floating party aboard the boat. Dine inside a floating restaurant to enjoy seafood and Vietnamese food for lunch. Soak up the rays on the sun loungers at Tranh Beach or play some fun water games.

Name: Private Nha Trang City Tour from Cruise Port
Description:
Nha Trang City is known not only for its romantic beauty of blue sea and white sand but also for many landscapes, architectural monuments such as Institute of Oceanography, Long Son Pagoda, Bao Dai Palace , Nha Trang Cathedral, PoNagar Towers, Hon Chong Promontory, Tram Huong Tower, XQ Historical Village…. Each of them offers a unique, attraction, and all come together in “Nha Trang- one day tour”
Nha Trang is no different from other cities of Vietnam in the sense that the city has got a great selection of local markets for travelers to explore and try their luck at bargaining. Markets are not only good for shopping for souvenirs and merch, they are also offer great insight into local culture and the day-to-day life of the locals.

Name: Nha Trang Port to Nha Trang City Private Tour
Description: Nha Trang is a coastal city in the South Central of Vietnam where is famous for its beaches but the city is also part of the ancient history of the country. It was known as Kauthara under the Kingdom of Cham, several temples were built by Champa centuries ago that are still stand today. Explore numerous attractions in Nha Trang City with City tour from Nha Trang Port now. Discover the best that the Vietnamese city of Nha Trang has to offer on this shore excursion. Make the most of your time at shore and discover the city of Nha Trang on this excursion from the cruise port.With a private guide, visit the highlights of the city including Hon Chong rock, Long Son Pagoda, Dam Market, and other architectural gems. While you explore, your guide provides context on the history and culture of the coastal city.

Name: Private Snorkeling Tour Nha Trang
Description:
The adjacent beaches of Nha Trang provide a wide area for swimming. Hon Mieu Island, where a man-made barrier protects a remarkable variety of local sea life, with domestic and native species grown in separate parts of its waters, is one of its most well-known.
When visiting the fishing communities on Hon Mieu island, the initial impression is a tranquil image by the sea with a rustic and wild aspect. These communities are ideal for immersing oneself in the primitive life of a fishing hamlet, where not only the gorgeous environment but also the nice, carefree people and distinctive culture, have followed them for hundreds of years. If you get the opportunity to visit Nha Trang, you will regret missing out on the country's picturesque fishing villages.

Name: 2 Day Car Tour Excursion Dalat and Mui Ne (Minimum 4 guest)
Description:
Da Lat is 150 Km away Nha Trang, Dalat is the capital of Lam Dong Province in southern Vietnam’s Central Highlands, is centered around a lake and golf course, and surrounded by hills, pine forests, lakes and waterfalls. Known as the “City of Eternal Spring” for its distinctive temperate climate, Đà Lạt was developed as a resort by the French in the early 1900s, and many reminders of its colonial heritage remain.
Weather: 18°C, Wind W at 19 km/h, 99% Humidity
Dalat holds some very unique European influence architecture and has cooler climate than the surrounding areas. Dalat today famed is as the city of Love, flowers growing, its has become popular holiday retreat for young Vietnamese couples.

Name: Full Day Trip - From Nha Trang to Dalat including Datanla Fall
Description:
Dalat or Da Lat is the capital city of Lam Dong province, Vietnam. Da Lat is the City of Flowers and honeymooners with lovely French villas, the fresh air, the beautiful waterfalls and gorgeous lakes sits in a lush and green valley of postcard beauty.
Da Lat sits approx. 1500 m (4921 ft) above sea level on the Lang Biang Plateau in the southern parts of the Central Highlands. So, you do not be surprised when someone called Da Lat as The City in the Forest.
So one day trip from Nhatrang to Dalat will a great day for your vacation!
We will see : Datanla waterfalls ( most popular waterfall in Dalat with longest Alpine Coaster 2,4km - pay extra ), Robin Hill ( most top view of little Paris and have a chance toTake a Cable Car - Pay extra ), Paradise Lake ( Biggest natural lake ), Truc Lam Zen Meditation Center, oldest Railway Station in VietNam, Linh Phuoc Pagoda, Dalat Square and Dalat Dry fruits if you desire. The trip will finishAround 3pm you can stay in Dalat or Back to Nha Tra

Name: NHA TRANG WATERFALL TOUR - Off the beaten tracks (Trekking, Climbing, Swimming)
Description:
The waterfall is around 30km from the city. We then head into the mountains, passing rice fields and plantations. Into the jungle and following the river on local paths, then scrabbling up over the rocks to the waterfalls, where you can choose from a number of Jump site from first time beginner to the more experienced. The water vapour and humid exhalation from the wet rocks will make you shiver in amused complacency. The scenery is bathed in a more serene quiet and one seems to be lost into a fairy land. To reach the first pool we climb a short distance over some rocks before swimming in the cool waters.
The brave can jump down into the deep pool below. You will also leave feelings relaxed and refreshed by the sound and glory of nature

Name: Street Food Tour With Chef Dat
Description: Dat, a Nha Trang-based tour guide and chef who runs the famous cooking class in Nha Trang. In impeccable English with a slight Australian accent – Chef Dat and some student-drivers take you to every corner of the city where you can enjoy special Nha Trang cuisine and he gives explanation in details how we’ll experience some of Nha Trang’s stellar street food and produce.
What's Included: Enjoy the local cuisine

Please bring your ticket with you to the attraction.

You need to be 18 years or older to book.
Operated by Vietnam Real Travel
Itinerary:
Total Duration: Duration: 4 hours

Stop 1: Nha Trang Beach
Duration: Admission ticket included
Description: Chef Dat and student drivers will come to pick you up from your hotel by motorbike scooter.

You hold on behind them as they weave through a sea of fellow riders. Scooters – ubiquitous in Vietnam – are by far the best way to get around, especially on our model, made famous by actress Audrey Hepburn in the 1953 film Roman Holiday.

We head away from the busy streets into quieter local neighbourhoods, well off the beaten track, where a low roadside table under an awning is staffed by smiling ladies. First come banh can– soft and fluffy rice flour mini pancakes, carefully cooked in small terracotta pans before being topped with a quail egg or served with toppings of minced pork ball, squid or shrimp.

The little domes are ridiculously moreish, a delicious sponge for the kaleidoscope of flavours and textures after being dunked in a bowl containing nuoc mam pha, the heady, pungent fish sauce made from fermented anchovies, mixed with your choice of fried spring onion.

Then there’s banh xeo, a crisp pancake – again made from rice flour, but golden with turmeric powder – and filled with bean sprouts, scallions and local squid. You wrap them in your choice of greens and dunk them in the same sauce you made earlier.

Next is Fresh rice paper rolls, pick up different herbs and pickled carrot, white radish together with BBQ minced pork wrapped around bamboo stick.

Get all of this on a soft rice-paper then make a roll for yourself, dip into a special sauce made from sticky rice, minced pork, fish sauce...and enjoy.

Another try would be the famous dish for Nha Trang is Bun Ca (noodle soup with tuna). That is a well combined of onion, tomato, with tuna will give a delicious broth served with different sliced herbs, season to have 4 different flavors of sweet, sour, salty and spicy.

The highlight of the street food tour is a dessert of Che Chuoi Nuong, that is a banana wrapped in sticky rice and banana leaf outside then grilled on a low char-coal fire till it gets crispy. Served in a plate topping with sweet coconut milk, sprinkle with some ground peanut.

Wow, it is so Yummy! let try it out!
Admission: Admission ticket included
Ticket: Type: Adult (age 18-65) | Price: US$66.67

Name: Half-day Sightseeing Tour
Description:
On this half-day tour, you’ll discover many of Nha Trang’s most important architectural, cultural and historical sites. Your journey will begin with a trip to the XQ Hand Embroidery Factory where you’ll watch artisans creating beautiful, intricate fabrics by hand and have a chance to purchase souvenirs.
Your next stop will be the Long Son Pagoda, an example of classic Buddhist architecture with incredible city views and a 46 ft Buddha statue. The second half of your tour will be dedicated to learning about the ancient Cham civilisation at the Po Nagar Cham temple complex, where you’ll cross the Cai River and spend time exploring the temple grounds.
What's Included:
Guide services
Admission fees
Water
Travel insurance

Name: Nha Trang Private day Trip To The Paradise (Ninh Van Bay –Ba Ho Waterfall)
Description:
Dear Our Manual Customers!
This trip will combine one of best sports must see when you're staying Nha Trang is Ba Ho Waterfalls and Ninh Van Village.
✅Take your time to explore Paradise Lakes in Nha Trang ( called Baho - There are 3 great lakes that must swim) ; enjoy fresh air, swimming, walking
✅Tourism potentials of Ninh Van Commune, Ninh Hoa Township, Khanh Hoa Province are being waken up with a lot of tourist projects. Especially, more and more visitors have come to Ninh Van to find peaceful feeling.
Over 50 kilometers apart from Nha Trang, Ninh Van is a peaceful land at Hon Heo mountain foot. The road along the mountain slope from Ninh Phuoc to Ninh Van is an attractive road to explorers. The green of stretching mountains and forests and the blue of sky and sea create a picturesque landscape. Looking to the east from there are white sand, garlic fields, red roofs and boats in the distance…. Especially, some young tourists have come to Ninh Van to explore a new land.
What's Included:
We'll stop at local restaurant to enjoy Vietnamese cruise .

Name: Romantic Tour In Nha Trang
Description: An exclusive tour for all the romantics of the world! Together with the professional local guide, you will visit the most romantic places in the city. Beautifully designed botanical gardens and gorgeous ocean views makes Nha Trang a favorite destination for couples. You will feel spellbound in a charming atmosphere. What is considered as one of the best places to have a date in the city? Where can you make lovely photos? You will be surprised how many historical love stories are hidden in the streets, buildings, parks of the city. From heartbreaking and tragic, to the hilarious or spicy ones. What is so special about the 'Po Nagar Cham Towers'? Why is it a popular spot for couples? What is the famous love story of the national hero Tran Quoc Tuan and the beautiful Princess Thien Thanh? This tour is especially recommended in the Saint Valentine period!

Description:
Being one of 29 most beautiful bays in the world, Nha Trang is a popular destination among beach lovers. Joining our Nha Trang day tours, tourists are ensured to get a full look at beauty of the most outstanding landscapes, enjoy the fresh seafood dishes and observe the peaceful but dynamic life of the locals.
Nha Trang is with no doubt one of the most favorite tourist destinations in Vietnam. This beach city has been very famous for its fantastic natural scenery of mountains, beaches and islands combined. Moreover, it is home to many historical sites such as: Long Son Pagoda and Thap Ba Ponaga Tower and temples.
Don't miss this Nha Trang city tour to explore this beautiful land and get wonderful memories !

Description: Together with the professional guide, you will visit the most charming places in the city. Why is Nha Trang known to be one of the most visited cities in Vietnam? Why does the city attract millions of visitors around the world? Have you heard about the beautiful 'Po Nagar Cham Towers'? You will have a chance to explore the city while hearing fascinating facts and legends. Nha Trang has made a name for itself as one of the prettiest seaside places in all of Vietnam. You will be surprised how many stories are hidden in the streets, buildings, and corners of Nha Trang. Your charming guide will tell you what is special and unique about living in this city. Perfect for those who are visiting the city for the first time and want to get the most of it!

Name: Street Food Discovery Tour
Description:
Welcome Fellow Food Lovers To The Real Vietnam Taste Experience !
This is our favorite and most popular tour . We offer a REAL insight into Vietnamese food culture with a diverse range of street food dishes . You will not find a tour like this in Vietnam . Throughout 4 hours with us, we will try really tasty Vietnamese dishes at 6 local places where are locals’ favorite areas. see decorated colorful streets on the back of a scooter . you will understand deeply about Vietnam’s culture and cuisine while talking with our local tour guides at food stalls.
A fun night out trying delicious Vietnamese Food on our Taste of Vietnam is the only way to spend a night in Nha Trang City.
We will travel to different restaurants throughout the night indulging in Vietnamese Food on our Tasting Menu.
Sit back and enjoy the ride as our Street Food Discovery Tour gives you the experience of a lifetime that you’ll be bragging about for years to come.

Name: Half Day Private City Tour Nha Trang
Description:
Nha Trang is known as the city of reeds and famous by Ponagar Temple (Cham Tower). Beside that, all of the highlights sight-seeing was very interesting for both type travellers domestic and international. Join us by half-day city tour to discover the beauty of Nha Trang.
* Nha Trang Cathedral - Was built in 1928 and established by Priest Louis Vallet during Vietnam war
* Long Son Pagoda - Was built 1886 by Monk Thich Ngo Tri and became the biggest Pagoda in Nha Trang
* Ponagar Temple (Cham Tower) - Was built rough 778 by Cham Dynasty
* Chong Promontory (Chong Rock) - Natural landscape with the legendary story of the wife and husband
* Dam Market - Was built in 1977 by the Government and became the biggest market until present

Joining our Nha Trang day tours, tourists are ensured to get a full look at beauty of the most outstanding landscapes, enjoy the fresh seafood dishes and observe the peaceful but dynamic life of the locals.
Nha Trang is with no doubt one of the most favorite tourist destinations in Vietnam. This beach city has been very famous for its fantastic natural scenery of mountains, beaches and islands combined. On this guided luxury sunset city cruise, you’ll indulge in an unforgettable romantic experience along the expansive Nha Trang Bay. A expert service team will warmly welcome you on board with a refreshing drink upon arrival before the vessel sets off.
With the sun setting in the horizon, you can savour a delightful cocktail session before sitting down for an exquisite five-course gourmet seafood dinner that you’ll take al fresco on the sundeck. Name: Nha Trang Cooking Class (visiting local market & countryside)
Description:
Accompanied & guided by Chef Dat with 18 year experience and Dat is also a certified English speaking guide for over 20 years. Chef Dat is well know on the Nha Trang restaurant scene for both his cooking skill and his ability to transfer some of his remarkable talents to eager students. Dat's excellent English skills will ensure a smooth, easy and educational day.
Using fresh ingredients and concocting imaginative flavors, this is a fun and interesting way to learn the local cuisine.
Enjoy a unique, hands - on cooking experience from start to finish in preparing three fabulous and traditional Vietnamese dishes.
As part of your culinary adventure you will also be given detailed recipes, so when you arrive back home, you will be able to impress your family and friends (and yourself) with some great Vietnamese food.

Name: NHA TRANG WATERFALL TOUR (Trekking, Climbing, Swimming) Off the beaten tracks
Description:
The waterfall is around 35 km from the city. We then head into the mountains, passing rice fields and plantations. Into the jungle and following the river on local paths, then scrabbling up over the rocks to the waterfalls, where you can choose from a number of Jump site from first time beginner to the more experienced. The water vapour and humid exhalation from the wet rocks will make you shiver in amused complacency. The scenery is bathed in a more serene quiet and one seems to be lost into a fairy land. To reach the first pool we climb a short distance over some rocks before swimming in the cool waters.
The brave can jump down into the deep pool below. You will also leave feelings relaxed and refreshed by the sound and glory of nature
What's Included:
Round-trip private transfer

Name: Hopping Tour with Snorkelling and Floating Party
Description:
On this guided tour, you will have the opportunity to explore one of the world’s most beautiful bays – Nha Trang Bay.
The tour will begin with a scenic cruise followed by snorkelling or a glass-bottom boat ride to explore the underwater life of the Hon Mun Marine Protected Area. Afterwards, you can enjoy a local lunch at An Nam restaurant, a drink at the floating bar, and some free time to unwind or swim at Bai Tranh Beach. The tour will be rounded off with a visit to the Tri Nguyen Aquarium, where you can marvel at the diverse marine life.

Round-trip transportation

Name: Full Day Car Tour Excursion Dalat ( Minimum 4 guest)
Description:
Da Lat is 93 Miles away Nha Trang, Dalat is the capital of Lam Dong Province in southern Vietnam’s Central Highlands, is centered around a lake and golf course, and surrounded by hills, pine forests, lakes and waterfalls. Known as the “City of Eternal Spring” for its distinctive temperate climate, Đà Lạt was developed as a resort by the French in the early 1900s, and many reminders of its colonial heritage remain.
Weather: 18°C, Wind W at 19 km/h, 99% Humidity
Dalat holds some very unique European influence architecture and has cooler climate than the surrounding areas. Dalat today famed is as the city of Love, flowers growing, its has become popular holiday retreat for young Vietnamese couples.
